[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”ADR Chambers is home to Canada’s top mediators who have collectively resolved tens of thousands of disputes across a wide range of sectors and situations.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:36px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1529512078215{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]ADR Chambers’ mediators include retired judges, senior lawyers, and other professionals.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Fees

Hourly fees for mediators range from $150 to $750 per hour plus HST, depending on the experience of the mediator. Many mediators have half and full-day rates. Please contact us to obtain rates for specific mediators.

Starting times

Full-day mediations begin at 10:00 a.m. unless otherwise agreed.

Half-day mediations begin at 10:00 a.m. or 2:00 p.m. unless otherwise agreed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Mediation facilities

ADR Chambers offers neutral, convenient, and well-equipped mediation space at our North York office, at 180 Duncan Mill Rd.

Rooms are available for a fee of $400 plus HST per day. The fee covers one main room and one breakout room. Additional rooms may be booked for $200 plus HST per day. Coffee, tea, cold drinks, and snacks are provided at no additional charge. Lunch, if requested, is billed at cost.

Please contact us to book your mediation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_btn title=”Book a Mediation” style=”custom” custom_background=”#dd0046″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-calendar” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fadrchambers.com%2Frequest-a-neutral%2F|||”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”154″][vc_custom_heading text=”General Information” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”70″][vc_custom_heading text=”Other Types of Mediation” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”71″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
